spell_tooltip.description: Your next Imp, Voidwalker, Incubus, Succubus, Felhunter, or Felguard Summon spell is free and has its casting time reduced by 90%.
All single-target damage done by you and your minions grants you and your pet shadowy shields that absorb 3% of the damage dealt, up to 10% of maximum health.

Increases your movement speed by 70%, but also damages you for 3% of your maximum health every 1 sec. Movement impairing effects may not reduce you below 100% of normal movement speed. Lasts until canceled.

Your Soul Leech absorption now passively recharges at a rate of 0.2% of maximum health every 1 sec, and may now absorb up to 10% of maximum health.

Increases your armor by 90%.

When Soul Leech absorbs damage, 10% of damage taken is absorbed and spread out over 5 sec.

Reduces damage taken by 3.0%.
Reduces the damage dealt by Burning Rush by 10%. Burning Rush increases your movement speed by an additional 20%.

Grants access to the following abilities:

urse of Tongues:
Forces the target to speak in Demonic, increasing the casting time of all spells by 30% for 1 min.

urses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.

urse of Exhaustion:
Reduces the target's movement speed by 50% for 12 sec.

urses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.

Summons a Demonic Circle for 15 min. Cast Demonic Circle: Teleport to teleport to its location and remove all movement slowing effects.

You also learn:

 emonic Circle: Teleport
Teleports you to your Demonic Circle and removes all movement slowing effects.
Horrifies an enemy target into fleeing, incapacitating for 3 sec and healing you for 20% of maximum health.
Stamina increased by 10%.
Increases the attack speed of your primary pet by 5%.
Increases the damage done by your primary pet by 5%.
Increases you and your pets' maximum health by 5%.
Your Healthstone heals you for an additional 10% of your maximum health. Any party or raid member using a Healthstone also heals you for that amount.
Creates a demonic gateway between two locations. Activating the gateway transports the user to the other gateway. Each player can use a Demonic Gateway only once per 90 sec.
Sacrifices 5% of your current health to shield you for 800% of the sacrificed health plus an additional 171,910 for 20 sec. Usable while suffering from control impairing effects.
Unending Resolve reduces damage taken by an additional 15%.
Stuns all enemies within 8 yds for 3 sec.
Dark Pact sacrifices only 5% of your current health for the same shield value.
Wild Imp damage increased by 40%.
Shadow Bolt damage increased by 15%.

Your spells have a 5% increased chance to deal a critical strike.

You gain 10% more of the Critical Strike stat from all sources.
Soul Leech also heals you for 15% and your pet for 100% of the absorption it grants.
20% of all damage you take is taken by your demon pet instead.

Healthstones you conjure for yourself are now Demonic Healthstones and can be used multiple times in combat. Demonic Healthstones cannot be traded.

 emonic Healthstone
Instantly restores 35% health. 60 sec cooldown.
Every Soul Shard you spend has a 5% chance to be refunded.

Grants access to the following abilities:

 emonbolt
Send the fiery soul of a fallen demon at the enemy, causing 180,112 Shadowflame damage.

enerates 2 Soul Shards.

 emonic Core
When your Wild Imps expend all of their energy or are imploded, you have a 10% chance to absorb their life essence, granting you a stack of Demonic Core. 

When your summoned Dreadstalkers fade away, you have a 100% chance to absorb their life essence, granting you a stack of Demonic Core.

Demonic Core reduces the cast time of Demonbolt by 100%. Maximum 4 stacks.
Demonic forces suck all of your Wild Imps toward the target, and then cause them to violently explode, dealing 53,145 Shadowflame damage to all enemies within 8 yards.
Summons 2 ferocious Dreadstalkers to attack the target for 12 sec.
Implosion deals 10% increased damage. Consuming a Demonic Core has a chance to summon a Wild Imp.
When your Dreadstalkers charge into battle, their Dreadbite attack now hits all targets within 8 yards and deals 10% more damage.
Your Dreadstalkers' attacks have a 10% chance to trigger an additional Dreadbite.
You passively summon a Wild Imp to fight for you every 12 sec.

Teaches your primary Felguard the following ability:

 oul Strike
Strike into the soul of the enemy, dealing 57,276 Shadow damage.

enerates 1 Soul Shard.
Infuse your Felguard with demonic strength and command it to charge your target and unleash a Felstorm that will deal 300% increased damage.
Shadow Bolt and Demonbolt deal 2% additional damage per demon you have summoned.

Increases all damage done by your pet by 4%.

Reduces the cast time of Shadow Bolt by 25% and increases its damage by 40%.
Soul Strike deals 20% increased damage and generates a Soul Shard.
Dreadbite causes the target to take 20% additional Shadowflame damage from your spell and abilities for the next 12 sec.
Instantly sacrifice up to 2 Wild Imps, generating 2 charges of Demonic Core that cause Demonbolt to deal 30% additional damage.

Summon a Demonic Tyrant to increase the duration of your Dreadstalkers, Vilefiend, Felguard, and up to 15 of your Wild Imps by 15 sec. Your Demonic Tyrant increases the damage of affected demons by 15%, while damaging your target.

Summons a Felguard who attacks the target for 17 sec that deals 125% increased damage.

This Felguard will stun and interrupt their target when summoned.
When your Wild Imps expire or die, your other demons are inspired and gain 1% additional damage, stacking up to 10 times.

Hand of Gul'dan has a 15% chance to burn its target for 70,031 additional Shadowflame damage every 2 sec for 6 sec.

If this effect is reapplied, any remaining damage will be added to the new Umbral Blaze.
Summon Demonic Tyrant empowers 5 additional Wild Imps and deals 10% increased damage for each demon he empowers.
Shadow Bolt and Demonbolt have a 20% chance to make your next Call Dreadstalkers cost 2 fewer Soul Shards and have no cast time.

When Demonbolt consumes a Demonic Core it inflicts impending doom upon the target, dealing 254,776 Shadow damage to enemies within 10 yds of its target after 20 sec or when removed. Damage is reduced beyond 8 targets.

Each Soul Shard spent on Hand of Gul'dan reduces the duration of Doom by 1 sec.
Hand of Gul'dan has a 15% chance to cast a second time on your target for free.
Summon a Vilefiend to fight for you for the next 15 sec.
Each Soul Shard spent on Hand of Gul'dan increases the damage of your next Call Dreadstalkers by 2%.
Increases the damage of Doom by 30% and Doom summons 1 Wild Imp when it expires.
Increases Vilefiend damage by 20% and your Vilefiend's Bile Spit now applies Wicked Maw.
Your Dreadstalkers deal 50% increased damage while your Vilefiend is active.
When Doom expires, you have a chance to summon a Doomguard that casts 5 Doom Bolts before departing. Each Doom Bolt deals 215,640 Shadow damage.
Wicked Maw causes the target to take 20% additional Shadow damage from your demons.

Your Summon Vilefiend becomes Summon Charhound and learns the following ability:

 nfernal Presence
Cloaked in the ever-burning flames of the abyss, dealing 11,658 Fire damage to enemies within 10 yards every 0.9 sec.

Spending a Soul Shard on a damaging spell grants Diabolic Ritual for 20 sec. While Diabolic Ritual is active, each Soul Shard spent on a damaging spell reduces its duration by 1 sec.

When Diabolic Ritual expires you gain Demonic Art, causing your next Hand of Gul'dan to summon an Overlord, Mother of Chaos, or Pit Lord that unleashes a devastating attack against your enemies.
Enemies damaged by your Overlord have their souls cloven, increasing damage taken by you and your pets by 5% for 15 sec.
Demonic Art increases the damage of your next Hand of Gul'dan by 100% and reduces its cast time by 50%.

Mother of Chaos empowers your next Shadow Bolt to become Infernal Bolt.

 nfernal Bolt
Hurl a bolt enveloped in the infernal flames of the abyss, dealing 732,856 Fire damage to your enemy target and generating 3 Soul Shards.
You always gain the benefit of Soulburn when casting Demonic Circle: Teleport, increasing your movement speed by 50% and making you immune to snares and roots for 6 sec.
Spending Soul Shards on damaging spells while your Demonic Tyrant is active decreases the duration of Diabolic Ritual by 1 additional sec.
Unending Resolve grants Soul Leech equal to 10% of your maximum health and increases the maximum amount Soul Leech can absorb by 10% for 8 sec.
Fire damage increased by 2% and damage dealt by your demons is increased by 2%.
Summon Demonic Tyrant is empowered, dealing 70% increased damage and increasing the damage of your demons by 20% while active.
Hand of Gul'dan deals 15% increased damage for each Soul Shard spent.

Summoning a Pit Lord causes your next Hand of Gul'dan to become Ruination.

 uination
Call down a demon-infested meteor from the depths of the Twisting Nether, dealing 822,556 Chaos damage on impact to all enemies within 8 yds of the target and summoning 3 Wild Imps.

Damage is reduced beyond 8 targets.
Your next Imp, Voidwalker, Incubus, Succubus, Felhunter, or Felguard Summon spell is free and has its casting time reduced by 90%.

Increases your movement speed by 70%, but also damages you for 3% of your maximum health every 1 sec. Movement impairing effects may not reduce you below 100% of normal movement speed. Lasts until canceled.

Increases your armor by 90%.

When Soul Leech absorbs damage, 10% of damage taken is absorbed and spread out over 5 sec.

Reduces damage taken by 3.0%.
Reduces the damage dealt by Burning Rush by 10%. Burning Rush increases your movement speed by an additional 20%.

urse of Tongues:
Forces the target to speak in Demonic, increasing the casting time of all spells by 30% for 1 min.

urses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.

urse of Exhaustion:
Reduces the target's movement speed by 50% for 12 sec.

urses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.

You also learn:

 emonic Circle: Teleport
Teleports you to your Demonic Circle and removes all movement slowing effects.
Horrifies an enemy target into fleeing, incapacitating for 3 sec and healing you for 20% of maximum health.
Stamina increased by 10%.
Increases the attack speed of your primary pet by 5%.
Increases the damage done by your primary pet by 5%.
Increases you and your pets' maximum health by 5%.
Your Healthstone heals you for an additional 10% of your maximum health. Any party or raid member using a Healthstone also heals you for that amount.
Creates a demonic gateway between two locations. Activating the gateway transports the user to the other gateway. Each player can use a Demonic Gateway only once per 90 sec.

Unending Resolve reduces damage taken by an additional 15%.
Stuns all enemies within 8 yds for 3 sec.
Dark Pact sacrifices only 5% of your current health for the same shield value.
Wild Imp damage increased by 40%.
Shadow Bolt damage increased by 15%.

Your spells have a 5% increased chance to deal a critical strike.

You gain 10% more of the Critical Strike stat from all sources.
Soul Leech also heals you for 15% and your pet for 100% of the absorption it grants.
20% of all damage you take is taken by your demon pet instead.

Healthstones you conjure for yourself are now Demonic Healthstones and can be used multiple times in combat. Demonic Healthstones cannot be traded.

 emonic Healthstone
Instantly restores 35% health. 60 sec cooldown.
Every Soul Shard you spend has a 5% chance to be refunded.

Triggers an explosion on the target, dealing 157,271 Fire damage.

enerates 5 Soul Shard Fragments.
Conflagrate reduces the cast time of your next Incinerate, Chaos Bolt, or Soul Fire by 30%. Maximum 2 charges.

Calls down a rain of hellfire the target location, dealing 198,712 Fire damage over 7.1 sec to enemies in the area.

his spell is cast at a selected location.
Conflagrate increases your Immolate, Incinerate, and Conflagrate damage to the target by 25% for 8 sec.

Increases your critical strike chance by 3%.

Physical attacks against you have a 25% chance to make your next Incinerate instant cast. This effect can only occur once every 6 sec.

Your single target spells have a 35% chance to apply Havoc to a nearby enemy for 5.0 sec.

 avoc
Marks a target with Havoc for 5.0 sec, causing your single target spells to also strike the Havoc victim for 65% of the damage dealt.
Calls forth a cataclysm at the target location, dealing 192,684 Shadowflame damage to all enemies within 8 yards and afflicting them with Immolate.
Backdraft increases the damage of your next Chaos Bolt by 5% and increases the critical strike chance of your next Incinerate or Soul Fire by 35%.
Increases the damage of Immolate by 25% and its duration by 3 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Conflagrate by 2 sec.
Increases the damage dealt by your spells and your demon by 3%.
Chaos Bolt, Shadowburn, and Incinerate deal 5% increased damage to targets afflicted by Immolate.
Launches 15 bolts of felfire over 2.7 sec at random targets afflicted by your Immolate within 40 yds. Each bolt deals 29,527 Fire damage to the target and 14,296 Fire damage to nearby enemies.
Increases the damage done by your Fire spells by 2% and reduces the cast time of your Incinerate spell by 20%.

Summons an Infernal from the Twisting Nether, impacting for 43,597 Fire damage and stunning all enemies in the area for 2 sec.

The Infernal will serve you for 30 sec, dealing 44,995 damage to all nearby enemies every 1.8 sec and generating 1 Soul Shard Fragment every 1 sec.
Incinerate now also hits all enemies near your target for 25% damage.
Channel Demonfire fires an additional 2 bolts. Each bolt increases the remaining duration of Immolate on all targets hit by 0.5 sec.
Chaos Bolt and Shadowburn increases the damage you deal to the target by 5% for 7 sec.
While your initial Infernal is active, every Soul Shard you spend has a 15% chance to summon an additional Infernal that lasts 8 sec.
Your spells have a chance to grant you 15% Haste for 8 sec.
Increases the damage of Channel Demonfire by 30% and it deals damage 35% faster.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Destruction spells by 5%.
Every 20 Soul Shards spent grants Ritual of Ruin, making your next Chaos Bolt or Rain of Fire consume no Soul Shards and have its cast time reduced by 50%.
Increases the critical strike damage of your Destruction spells by 5%.
Increases the damage of Chaos Bolt by 10% and reduces its cast time by 0.5 sec.
Ritual of Ruin requires 5 less Soul Shards spent.
Periodic damage dealt by Immolate has a 5% chance to tear open a Dimensional Rift.

Consuming Ritual of Ruin summons an Overfiend for 8 sec.

 ummon Overfiend
Generates 1 Soul Shard Fragment every 1 sec and casts Chaos Bolt at 80% effectiveness at its summoner's target.
Incinerate now generates 100% additional Soul Shard Fragments.
Bolts from Dimensional Rift now deal 25% of damage dealt to nearby enemies as Fire damage.
Enemies damaged by your Overlord have their souls cloven, increasing damage taken by you and your pets by 5% for 15 sec.
Demonic Art increases the damage of your next Hand of Gul'dan by 100% and reduces its cast time by 50%.

Mother of Chaos empowers your next Shadow Bolt to become Infernal Bolt.

 nfernal Bolt
Hurl a bolt enveloped in the infernal flames of the abyss, dealing 732,856 Fire damage to your enemy target and generating 3 Soul Shards.
You always gain the benefit of Soulburn when casting Demonic Circle: Teleport, increasing your movement speed by 50% and making you immune to snares and roots for 6 sec.
Spending Soul Shards on damaging spells while your Demonic Tyrant is active decreases the duration of Diabolic Ritual by 1 additional sec.
Unending Resolve heals you for 30% of your maximum health over 10 sec.
Fire damage increased by 2% and damage dealt by your demons is increased by 2%.
Summon Demonic Tyrant is empowered, dealing 70% increased damage and increasing the damage of your demons by 20% while active.
Hand of Gul'dan deals 15% increased damage for each Soul Shard spent.

Summoning a Pit Lord causes your next Hand of Gul'dan to become Ruination.

 uination
Call down a demon-infested meteor from the depths of the Twisting Nether, dealing 822,556 Chaos damage on impact to all enemies within 8 yds of the target and summoning 3 Wild Imps.

Damage is reduced beyond 8 targets.
